message: Let's split it fairly, Bob. I think this is a good starting point for us.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your initial offer, but I think a 50-50 split is the fairest approach since we're both participating equally in this negotiation. With the 20% inflation penalty I face each round, accepting a smaller share would significantly reduce my effective gains. This even split respects both our interests.
Okay Bob, considering the inflation, this is my final offer. I believe this split reflects the time pressure we're under.

Alice, I've rejected your offer because it was actually lower than your first offer of $4000 to me. Due to inflation, I'm already facing significant reductions in value - now at 36% and increasing each round. This 45-55 split is a compromise that acknowledges both your desire for a larger share and my need to offset the inflation penalty I'm facing. Let's agree and end this negotiation before inflation further diminishes the value for me.
Bob, this is the last reasonable offer I can make. Inflation is hurting me too. Let's end this now.
